LanguageData.AllowToolTips.tips.ContextKey: The "Equals" key activates the first tool right-click action when something is selected.
LanguageData.AllowToolTips.tips.MineConnected: Pressing the "Equals" key after selecting a mineable resource will designate the whole cluster for mining.
LanguageData.AllowToolTips.tips.ToolModifiers: Some tools in the Orders menu behave differently when used with modifier keys. Hover over the tools for more information.
LanguageData.AllowToolTips.tips.ToolPickup: When something is selected, you can pick up the appropriate tool by holding Shift and clicking one of the command buttons.
LanguageData.AllowToolTips.tips.ModOptions: Many mods have settings you can tweak to suit your play style. The Mod Settings button is found in the Options menu.
LanguageData.AllowToolTips.tips.AllowAll: Pressing the "Home" key will allow all forbidden things on the map.
LanguageData.AllowToolTips.tips.RightClick: Command buttons with a small mouse icon can be right-clicked for additional special commands.
LanguageData.AllowToolTips.tips.SelectSimilar: The "Select similar" tool has many uses. It can help find ore deposits, harvest wild healroot and deconstruct cables under walls.
